main event: On February 26, 1953, multiple observers described sightings of an unusual unidentified light in the sky, which exhibited bizarre movement and color changes.
interesting points: The first observer reported seeing a red light moving quickly and performing a 360-degree turn, The light was described as being approximately 15-20 miles away and not resembling standard aircraft, Observers reported that the light seemed to be traveling in straight lines and then abruptly changed course, One observer claimed to see a bright orange light changing shapes and sizes at a high altitude, Reports suggested that investigations later attributed some sightings to Venus and balloons rather than unidentified flying objects.
sighted object: A strange bright light that changed colors and moved erratically in the sky
